パッケージの使用
org.sxb.core.task

  • org.sxb.core.taskを使用しているパッケージ 
    パッケージ 説明
    org.sxb.core.scheduling
    尚未启用，定时任务处理用 General exceptions for Spring's scheduling support, independent of any specific scheduling system.
    org.sxb.core.scheduling.concurrent
    Scheduling convenience classes for the java.util.concurrent and javax.enterprise.concurrent packages, allowing to set up a ThreadPoolExecutor or ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor as a bean in a Spring context.
    org.sxb.core.task
    任务调度用
    org.sxb.core.task.support
    Support classes for Spring's TaskExecutor abstraction.
  • org.sxb.core.schedulingにより使用されるorg.sxb.core.taskのクラス 
    クラスと説明
    AsyncTaskExecutor
    Extended interface for asynchronous TaskExecutor implementations, offering an overloaded AsyncTaskExecutor.execute(Runnable, long) variant with a start timeout parameter as well support for Callable.
    TaskExecutor
    Simple task executor interface that abstracts the execution of a Runnable.
  • org.sxb.core.scheduling.concurrentにより使用されるorg.sxb.core.taskのクラス 
    クラスと説明
    AsyncListenableTaskExecutor
    Extension of the AsyncTaskExecutor interface, adding the capability to submit tasks for ListenableFutures.
    AsyncTaskExecutor
    Extended interface for asynchronous TaskExecutor implementations, offering an overloaded AsyncTaskExecutor.execute(Runnable, long) variant with a start timeout parameter as well support for Callable.
    CustomizableThreadCreator
    线程安全用自定制线程生成器
    Simple customizable helper class for creating new Thread instances.
    TaskExecutor
    Simple task executor interface that abstracts the execution of a Runnable.
  • org.sxb.core.taskにより使用されるorg.sxb.core.taskのクラス 
    クラスと説明
    AsyncListenableTaskExecutor
    Extension of the AsyncTaskExecutor interface, adding the capability to submit tasks for ListenableFutures.
    AsyncTaskExecutor
    Extended interface for asynchronous TaskExecutor implementations, offering an overloaded AsyncTaskExecutor.execute(Runnable, long) variant with a start timeout parameter as well support for Callable.
    CustomizableThreadCreator
    线程安全用自定制线程生成器
    Simple customizable helper class for creating new Thread instances.
    CustomizableThreadFactory
    Implementation of the ThreadFactory interface, allowing for customizing the created threads (name, priority, etc).
    ExecutorConfigurationSupport
    Base class for classes that are setting up a java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService (typically a ThreadPoolExecutor).
    TaskExecutor
    Simple task executor interface that abstracts the execution of a Runnable.
    TaskRejectedException
    Exception thrown when a TaskExecutor rejects to accept a given task for execution.
  • org.sxb.core.task.supportにより使用されるorg.sxb.core.taskのクラス 
    クラスと説明
    AsyncListenableTaskExecutor
    Extension of the AsyncTaskExecutor interface, adding the capability to submit tasks for ListenableFutures.
    AsyncTaskExecutor
    Extended interface for asynchronous TaskExecutor implementations, offering an overloaded AsyncTaskExecutor.execute(Runnable, long) variant with a start timeout parameter as well support for Callable.
    TaskExecutor
    Simple task executor interface that abstracts the execution of a Runnable.
